API Reference¶

matryoshka is made up of two key modules:

  • matryoshka.emulator
    • Transfer Function
    • Mass Variance
    • Mass Variance Logarithmic Derivative
    • Growth Function
    • Nonlinear Boost
    • Galaxy Power Spectrum
  • matryoshka.halo_model_funcs
